name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt sospette
desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. It's said that a hash brown without jam is not worthy of the Mondstadt name... But is this even a hash brown?

value.text: Restores 30% of Max HP and an additional 600 HP to the selected character.

value.name: Ricetta: frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
value.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making a Mondstadt Hash Brown.

value.name: Pigna
value.desc: Filled with oil-rich seeds. Certainly won't be growing into a tree from inside a squirrel's stomach.

value.name: Patata
value.desc: A chunky vegetable. A gift from the earth that you never tire of with its multitude of cooking methods.

value.name: Marmellata
value.desc: A gelatinous substance made from fruit and sugar. Even a little bit can easily wake up tired taste buds.

value.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt deliziose
value.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. Close your eyes and feel the mild breeze and sweet dew that Mondstadt offers.

value.name: Frittelle di patate di Mondstadt
value.desc: A fried cake of mashed potatoes. A little bit of pinecone helps give it a nice crunch, and great with a bit of jam. Loved by people of all ages.
